sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我哥哥是一名软件工程师，经常要加班到很晚。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ gēge shì yī míng ruǎnjiàn gōngchéngshī, jīngcháng yào jiābān dào hěn wǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon grand frère est ingénieur logiciel et doit souvent faire des heures supplémentaires jusqu'à tard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My older brother is a software engineer and often has to work overtime until very late.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个问题太复杂了，我需要仔细考虑一下再回答。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège wèntí tài fùzá le, wǒ xūyào zǐxì kǎolǜ yīxià zài huídá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette question est trop compliquée, je dois y réfléchir attentivement avant de répondre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This question is too complicated, I need to think about it carefully before answering.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 虽然下雨了，但是运动会还是按照原计划进行。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Suīrán xiàyǔ le, dànshì yùndònghuì háishi ànzhào yuán jìhuà jìnxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bien qu'il pleuve, les jeux sportifs se déroulent quand même comme prévu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Although it's raining, the sports meet is still going ahead as originally planned.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她的梦想是成为一名优秀的建筑设计师。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de mèngxiǎng shì chéngwéi yī míng yōuxiù de jiànzhù shèjìshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son rêve est de devenir une excellente architecte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her dream is to become an excellent architect.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 为了提高英语水平，他每天都坚持听英语广播。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wèile tígāo Yīngyǔ shuǐpíng, tā měitiān dōu jiānchí tīng Yīngyǔ guǎngbō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pour améliorer son niveau d'anglais, il écoute la radio anglaise tous les jours sans faute.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: To improve his English level, he insists on listening to English radio every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这座博物馆收藏了很多珍贵的历史文物。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zuò bówùguǎn shōucángle hěn duō zhēnguì de lìshǐ wénwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce musée abrite de nombreux objets historiques précieux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This museum houses many precious historical artifacts.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们应该保护环境，减少使用一次性塑料制品。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi bǎohù huánjìng, jiǎnshǎo shǐyòng yīcìxìng sùliào zhìpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devrions protéger l'environnement et réduire l'utilisation de produits en plastique jetables.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should protect the environment and reduce the use of disposable plastic products.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他从小就对音乐很感兴趣，学会了好几种乐器。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā cóngxiǎo jiù duì yīnyuè hěn gǎn xìngqù, xuéhuìle hǎo jǐ zhǒng yuèqì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'intéresse à la musique depuis son enfance et a appris plusieurs instruments.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has been interested in music since childhood and has learned several instruments.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这次会议讨论了公司未来的发展方向和战略规划。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè cì huìyì tǎolùnle gōngsī wèilái de fāzhǎn fāngxiàng hé zhànlüè guīhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette réunion a discuté de l'orientation future de l'entreprise et de la planification stratégique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This meeting discussed the company's future development direction and strategic planning.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 晚饭后散散步对消化很有好处。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǎnfàn hòu sànsàn bù duì xiāohuà hěn yǒu hǎochu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Se promener après le dîner est très bénéfique pour la digestion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Taking a walk after dinner is very beneficial for digestion.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 老师表扬了她，因为她这次考试进步很大。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī biǎoyángle tā, yīnwèi tā zhè cì kǎoshì jìnbù hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur l'a félicitée car elle a fait de grands progrès lors de cet examen.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher praised her because she made great progress on this exam.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 冬天到了，我得买一件厚实的羽绒服来御寒。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dōngtiān dào le, wǒ děi mǎi yī jiàn hòushi de yǔróngfú lái yùhán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'hiver est arrivé, je dois acheter une doudoune épaisse pour me protéger du froid.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Winter has arrived, I need to buy a thick down jacket to keep warm.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他性格很开朗，总是能给周围的人带来欢乐。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xìnggé hěn kāilǎng, zǒngshì néng gěi zhōuwéi de rén dàilái huānlè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a un caractère très joyeux et apporte toujours de la joie aux gens autour de lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a very cheerful personality and always brings joy to people around him.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个城市的夜景非常美丽，吸引了很多游客。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège chéngshì de yèjǐng fēicháng měilì, xīyǐnle hěn duō yóukè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La vue nocturne de cette ville est très belle et attire beaucoup de touristes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The night view of this city is very beautiful and attracts many tourists.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 父母从小就教育我要诚实守信，不能说谎。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fùmǔ cóngxiǎo jiù jiàoyù wǒ yào chéngshí shǒuxìn, bù néng shuōhuǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mes parents m'ont appris depuis mon enfance à être honnête et digne de confiance, et à ne pas mentir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My parents taught me from childhood to be honest and trustworthy, and not to lie.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们约好了周六下午在电影院门口见面。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yuēhǎole zhōuliù xiàwǔ zài diànyǐngyuàn ménkǒu jiànmiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons convenu de nous rencontrer samedi après-midi devant le cinéma.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We agreed to meet on Saturday afternoon at the cinema entrance.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这份工作的薪水不错，但是压力比较大。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè fèn gōngzuò de xīnshuǐ bùcuò, dànshì yālì bǐjiào dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le salaire de ce travail est bon, mais le stress est assez élevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The salary for this job is good, but the pressure is quite high.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 昨天的演唱会气氛特别热烈，观众都很投入。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuótiān de yǎnchànghuì qìfēn tèbié rèliè, guānzhòng dōu hěn tóurù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'ambiance du concert d'hier était particulièrement chaleureuse, le public était très engagé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The atmosphere at yesterday's concert was especially enthusiastic, the audience was very engaged.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她决定辞职去追求自己真正喜欢的事业。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā juédìng cízhí qù zhuīqiú zìjǐ zhēnzhèng xǐhuan de shìyè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a décidé de démissionner pour poursuivre la carrière qu'elle aime vraiment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She decided to quit her job to pursue the career she truly loves.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个手机应用程序的界面设计得很简洁，操作起来很方便。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège shǒujī yìngyòng chéngxù de jièmiàn shèjì de hěn jiǎnjié, cāozuò qǐlái hěn fāngbiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'interface de cette application mobile est conçue de manière très épurée et facile à utiliser.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The interface of this mobile app is designed very simply and is very convenient to operate.
